name: draw-app-monorepo
description: Draw app with Go backend and React frontend

scripts.start-docker: docker build -t draw-app . && docker run -p 8080:8080 draw-app
scripts.start-docker:detached: docker build -t draw-app . && docker run -d -p 8080:8080 --name draw-app draw-app
scripts.stop-docker: docker stop draw-app && docker rm draw-app
scripts.start-local: npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:backend && npm run run:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
